SATURDAY MATINS

After God the Lord..., the troparion: O Christ our God... (p. 1250) (without the theotokion).

Sessional Hymn (Tone 1): Taking pity on the tears of Martha and Mary,* O Christ our God, You ordered the stone to be rolled away from the tomb;* by Your call, You raised the dead man and broke the bolts of Hades* to establish our faith in the life-giving resurrection of all.* Glory to Your power, O Savior;* glory to Your sovereign majesty;* glory to You, for by Your word You uphold the whole world.
